text: But Jehosheba, the daughter of king Joram, sister of Ahaziah, took Joash the son of Ahaziah, and stole him away from among the kingÂ’s sons that were slain, even him and his nurse, <FI>and put them<Fi> in the bedchamber; and they hid him from Athaliah, so that he was not slain;
name: II Kings 11:2
